entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:29 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of ice pellets mixed with snow near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 50 in the morning then diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
